data.text: O God, nɨ uan arazir aghuiba deravɨra atrivim geghan.
Eghtɨ a nɨn gumazamiziba ko gumazir onganarazibagh amiba,
Nɨ men ingangaribar aven bizir aghuir avɨribar amutɨ,
Atrivim deragh onganarazibagh amir gumazamizibar akurvagh men osɨmtɨziba akɨram.
O God, kɨ kamaghɨn nɨn azai.
Nɨ atrivim damightɨ a gumazir aghuimɨn mɨn ikɨtɨ,
A ikɨvɨra ikiamin dughiar kam, gumazamiziba arazir aghuimra gɨn mangam.
An atrivimɨn ikɨ ongarimɨn roghɨra itir gumazamiziba ko saghon itiba, a me gativagh men ganam.
Atrivir kamɨn apanir maba dɨpaba puvatɨzir danganimɨn ikɨ a bagh teviba apɨram.
Spenɨn kantrin atriviba ko arighatɨzibar atriviba, me bizir aghuiba a danɨngam.
Atriviba bar izɨ a bagh teviba apɨram.
Guizbangɨra, an onganarazibagh amir gumazamizibar dɨmdiaba baragha men akurvasi.
Gumazamizir onganarazibagh amua gavgaviba puvatɨziba,
Gumazamizir arazir kurabagh amiba, me gasɨghasɨgh me abɨnsɨ damutɨ,
Atrivimɨn ikɨrɨmɨrim a ruaragham.
Dagher avɨriba Lebanonɨn kantrin otivi moghɨn, gumazamizibar azenibar otiv.
Gumazamiziba, atrivir kamɨn ziam gɨnamangan kogham.
E Israelian Ikiavɨra Itir Godɨn ziam fam.
E zurara an ziar aghuir kam fɨvɨra ikiam.
Kar Jesin otarim Devit,
